title: Match history bug
body: Hey guys me and my friend are experiencing some issues, So i played 2 games of ARAM to get the 200 cs then after i done that i checked my progress and it wasnt moving it still said 0/200 ARAM minions killed so then i went to my match history to check my cs kills but there is the problem it didnt show the last 2 games i played wasn't there just wanted to know if me and my friend is the only one and its so bull how im going to have to get 200 cs again thanks for listening

replies.body:
Hey Irelia carries u,

Thanks for reporting this issue. I'll see if I can get a hold of someone who can look into this for you guys.

hey Wuks

Thanks for replying, it would be great if they can do something about it i and the summoners who are experiencing this would appreciate it thanks again

Hey Irelia carries u,

NOC posted an update about the issue a few hours ago:
>Network Operations â€“ 4:58 AM
We are aware of issues with match history, end of games stats and Bilgewater rewards progress not working properly. We're currently investigating.

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#oce
Yeah man the same problem here
